title: Purea Di Fave Con Cicorica Recipe
summary: Purea Di Fave Con Cicorica Recipe might be just the main course you are searching for. Watching your figure? This gluten free and vegan recipe has 347 calories, 17g of protein, and 15g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 4. For 93 cents per serving, this recipe covers 29% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 4 people have tried and liked this recipe. If you have onion, fava beans, olive oil, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the olive oil you could follow this main course with the Sauteed Banana, Granolan and Yogurt Parfait as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 1 hour and 20 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 96%. This score is spectacular.
